model

Class Blogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Blogger

  • public class Blogger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Blogger object. It has the details regarding the blogger like its blogger id and all the famous posts which has been posted by him/her

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Blogger(java.lang.Integer bloggerId)
      Parameterized constructor to initialize the blogger object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPost(Post post)
      This method adds one post into the list of famous posts by the blogger
      java.lang.Integer getBloggerId()
      This is the getter for the id of the blogger
      java.util.List<Post> getPosts()
      This method returns the list of famous posts by Blogger
      void setBloggerId(java.lang.Integer bloggerId)
      This is the setter for the Blogger Id
      void setPosts(java.util.List<Post> posts)
      This method sets the list of posts by the given blogger
